DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Epratuzumab with standard treatments for patients with SLE.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Epratuzumab in Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE)
DOC.criteria: +ANA at screening BILAG Index B Level Activity in at least 2 body systems/organs Has SLE by ACR revised criteria (meets,<4 criteria) Active Severe Lupus as defined by BILAG Index Level A in any body system or organ. Allergy to human antibodies or Murine.
